prompt: A regular octagon has the same perimeter as the regular hexagon shown here with side length 16 cm.  How long is each side of the octagon? [asy]size(80); pair A = dir(120); pair B=dir(60); pair M=(A+B)/2; draw(dir(360)--B--A--dir(180)--dir(240)--dir(300)--cycle); label("16 cm", M, N);[/asy]Please reason step by step, and put your final answer within \boxed{}.
